name: Don't shoot!!!
description:
WARNING- SOME SOUNDS ARE VERY LOUD (GUNSHOTS ETC) SO DON'T LISTEN WITH THE VOLUME TOO HIGH :)

A short, multiple-choice, story based game created in three hours for Trijam with the theme "Don't shoot!". The graphics are very rough and the game is short (but hopefully fun). If people like the concept I might polish it and release it on Itch.io as a more presentable game so let me know if you would appreciate that :). The game itself took 3 hours and a few additional hours were spent planning and building etc (as per the rules of Trijam).

Coding / Story: Desmodium Games

Voice acting: Oliver Wilson-Dickson

Crisp-eating sound effect by Taira Komori: Freesound - "eating_crisps1.mp3" by Taira Komori
